name: Get The Human
description:
This is a casual, addictive and increasingly difficult jumping dodging game similar to an endless runner kind of experience. My high score is 91. But that's before I added the Double Dodge and Super Dodge bonuses. That's when you narrowly escape 2 or more energy bolts from the turrets.

If there is an interest and time we will add more content, but it is a complete and fun game as ready for release as any simple indie game gets.

Here's a video preview:

https://youtu.be/mug0YHHyjXw

get game
